name: NIGERIAN COLLEGE OF AVIATION TECHNOLOGY(NCAT)
about: The Nigerian College of Aviation Technology (NCAT), established in 1964, is a premier aviation training institution in Africa. With over 50 years of experience, NCAT provides comprehensive training programs for pilots, air traffic controllers, aircraft maintenance engineers, and other aviation professionals. The college is accredited by the Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) and is an ICAO TRAINAIR Plus Regional Training Center of Excellence. NCAT's flying school offers a range of programs, from Private Pilot License (PPL) to Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), adhering to ICAO standards. The college boasts a modern fleet of aircraft and advanced training facilities, including a 3D Visual Tower Simulator and a B737 aircraft for cabin crew training. NCAT is committed to providing a safe, healthy, and inclusive environment for academic pursuits, ensuring its graduates meet international standards for safe transportation.
